# thickness

**Instance Property**

The thickness of the status bar, in pixels.

## Declaration

```swift
var thickness: CGFloat { get }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is `20.0`. The status bar returned by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSStatusBar/system] has a thickness of 22 pixels, which corresponds to the thickness of the menu bar.

## Getting Status-Bar Attributes

- **isVertical**: A Boolean value indicating whether the status bar has a vertical orientation.
